title: Charm. 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom upstairs Extra Belcony Cute Baby Bed!
posting_body: This is a beautiful, sunny, time honored three level townhouse duplex, loaded with character and charm.
A large kitchen, dining room and living room.
Driveway backdoor leads to the basement (and kitchen) which has a washer and dryer and plenty of space.
Cats OK Dogs with landlord approval.
Upper-level unit in a small complex with excellent off-street parking.
Rent includes water, sewer, trash and recycling.
Utilities, lawn maintenance and snow removal are the responsibility of the tenant.
Upper-level unit in a small complex with off-street parking.
The handsome stone and steel kitchen overlooks the chic living room, with a fireplace, exposed brick, hardwood floors and a built-in desk and shelves.
The second floor bedroom is surrounded by large windows and sliders with Juliet balconies, a newly tiled three-piece bath and convenient full-size laundry.
If you are interested please send me your number.
